questions.question: Which of the following is the primary reason to use a warm gel during an abdominal ultrasound?
options: Improve patient comfort and reduce motion
questions.answer: Improve patient comfort and reduce motion
questions.explanation: Warm gel helps relax the patient, reducing involuntary motion that could degrade image quality.
questions.reference: ARDMS SPI Content Outline â€” Patient Care; AIUM Practice Parameter for Ultrasound Examinations

questions.question: When obtaining a longitudinal view of the liver, which anatomic landmark helps confirm proper scan orientation?
questions.explanation: The falciform ligament is a reliable midline landmark in longitudinal liver scans.
